member.name: M:OAuth.Net.Components.GuidTokenGenerator.CreateRequestToken(OAuth.Net.Common.IConsumer,OAuth.Net.Common.OAuthParameters)
member.summary: Create a new request token
member.param: The consumer for whom the token is to be created
The parameters that were sent in the request that created this token (both OAuth and additional parameters).
member.returns: A request token

member.name: M:OAuth.Net.Components.GuidTokenGenerator.CreateAccessToken(OAuth.Net.Common.IConsumer,OAuth.Net.Common.IRequestToken)
member.summary: Create a new access token
member.param: The consumer for whom the token is to be created
The request token being swapped for this access token
member.returns: An access token

member.name: M:OAuth.Net.Components.HmacSha1SigningProvider.CheckRequest(System.Web.HttpRequest)
member.summary: The HMAC-SHA1 signature method has no pre-conditions
member.returns: True

member.name: M:OAuth.Net.Components.HmacSha1SigningProvider.ComputeSignature(System.String,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Computes the HMAC-SHA1 signature using as the text and & parameter encoded as the key.
member.param: The signature base string (see OAuth Core 1.0 ยง9.1)
member.returns: The computed signature

member.summary: This signing provider provides HMAC-SHA1 signing

member.summary: The PLAINTEXT signature method may require a secure connection. This is controlled by the requireSecureConnection configuration parameter.

member.summary: Computes the PLAINTEXT signature as &. The consumerSecret and tokenSecret are encoded ( see OAuth Editors Cut 1.0 ยง 3.3.4)
member.param: The signature base string (see OAuth Core 1.0 ยง9.1)
member.returns: The computed signature

member.summary: Checks the signature provided is the same as that which would be generated for the consumerSecret, tokenSecret and signatureBase.
member.param: The signature base string (see OAuth Core 1.0 ยง9.1)

member.summary: This signing provider provides PLAINTEXT signing

member.name: T:OAuth.Net.Components.InMemoryConsumerStore
member.summary: An thread-safe, in-memory implementation of IConsumerStore. Items are not persisted across application restarts.

member.name: M:OAuth.Net.Components.InMemoryConsumerStore.#ctor
member.summary: Create a new in-memory consumer store.

member.name: M:OAuth.Net.Components.InMemoryConsumerStore.#ctor(System.Collections.Generic.IList{OAuth.Net.Common.IConsumer})
member.summary: Create a new in-memory consumer store with a set of pre-defined consumers

member.name: M:OAuth.Net.Components.InMemoryConsumerStore.Add(OAuth.Net.Common.IConsumer)
member.summary: Adds the supplied consumer to the consumer store. If the consumer conflicts with a consumer already in the store, then false is returned.
member.returns: true, iff the consumer was stored

member.name: M:OAuth.Net.Components.InMemoryConsumerStore.Contains(System.String)
member.summary:
Checks whether the store contains a consumer with the given consumer key.
This will return true even if the consumer has a status other than Valid.
member.returns: true, iff there is such a consumer in the store

member.name: M:OAuth.Net.Components.InMemoryConsumerStore.GetByKey(System.String)
member.summary: Gets the consumer registered with the given consumer key.
member.returns: The consumer registered with the consumer key if successful, or null if there is no consumer registered with the supplied key

member.name: M:OAuth.Net.Components.InMemoryConsumerStore.Update(OAuth.Net.Common.IConsumer)
member.summary: Updates the given consumer in the store.
member.returns: true, iff the consumer was successfully updated in the store

member.name: M:OAuth.Net.Components.InMemoryConsumerStore.Remove(OAuth.Net.Common.IConsumer)
member.summary: Removes the specified consumer from the store.
member.returns: true, iff the consumer was successfully removed from the store. This will return false if the consumer did not exist in the store.

member.name: P:OAuth.Net.Components.InMemoryConsumerStore.Consumers
member.summary: Gets all the consumers in the store.

member.name: P:OAuth.Net.Components.InMemoryConsumerStore.Count
member.summary: The number of consumers held in the store

member.summary: The token

member.summary: The token secret

member.name: P:OAuth.Net.Components.OAuthRequestToken.ConsumerKey
member.summary: The key of the consumer this token was issued to

member.name: P:OAuth.Net.Components.OAuthRequestToken.Status
member.summary: The status of the token

member.name: P:OAuth.Net.Components.OAuthRequestToken.Type
member.summary: Returns the type of token represented

member.name: P:OAuth.Net.Components.OAuthRequestToken.AssociatedParameters
member.summary: The parameters that were sent in the request that created this token (both OAuth and additional parameters).

member.name: P:OAuth.Net.Components.OAuthRequestToken.AuthenticatedUser
member.summary: The identity of the user who has authenticated against this token

member.name: P:OAuth.Net.Components.OAuthRequestToken.Roles
member.summary: The roles of the user who has authenticated against this token

member.name: T:OAuth.Net.Components.InMemoryTokenStore
member.summary: An thread-safe, in-memory implementation of ITokenStore. Items are not persisted across application restarts.

member.name: M:OAuth.Net.Components.InMemoryTokenStore.#ctor
member.summary: Create a new in-memory token store.

member.name: M:OAuth.Net.Components.InMemoryTokenStore.Add(OAuth.Net.Common.IRequestToken)
member.summary: Adds the supplied request token to the token store. If the token conflicts with a token already in the store, then false is returned.
member.returns: true, iff the token was stored

member.name: M:OAuth.Net.Components.InMemoryTokenStore.Add(OAuth.Net.Common.IAccessToken)
member.summary: Adds the supplied access token to the token store. If the token conflicts with a token already in the store, then false is returned.
member.returns: true, iff the token was stored

member.name: M:OAuth.Net.Components.InMemoryTokenStore.Contains(System.String)
member.summary:
Checks whether the store contains ANY token with the given token string.
This will return true even if the token has a status other than Valid.
member.returns: true, iff there is such a token in the store

member.name: M:OAuth.Net.Components.InMemoryTokenStore.ContainsRequestToken(System.String)
member.summary:
Checks whether the store contains a request token with the given token string.
This will return true even if the token has a status other than Valid.
member.returns: true, iff there is such a token in the store

member.name: M:OAuth.Net.Components.InMemoryTokenStore.ContainsAccessToken(System.String)
member.summary:
Checks whether the store contains an access token with the given token string.
This will return true even if the token has a status other than Valid.
member.returns: true, iff there is such a token in the store

member.name: M:OAuth.Net.Components.InMemoryTokenStore.GetRequestToken(System.String)
member.summary: Gets the request token with the given token from the store. Returns null if there is no such token in the store.
member.returns: The token matching the inputs, or null if no such token exists in the store

member.name: M:OAuth.Net.Components.InMemoryTokenStore.GetAccessToken(System.String)
member.summary: Gets the request token with the given token from the store. Returns null if there is no such token in the store.
member.returns: The token matching the inputs, or null if no such token exists in the store

member.name: M:OAuth.Net.Components.InMemoryTokenStore.GetTokensByUser(System.Security.Principal.IIdentity)
member.summary:
Gets an array of request AND access tokens associated with a given user.
NB: In this implementation, this is an inefficient lookup as it requires a scan of all the tokens in the store.
member.returns: A collection of request AND access tokens, or null if no tokens are associated with the user

member.name: M:OAuth.Net.Components.InMemoryTokenStore.GetTokensByUser(System.Security.Principal.IIdentity,System.String)
member.summary: Gets an array of request AND access tokens associated with a given user for a given consumer.
member.returns: A collection of request AND access tokens, or null if no tokens are associated with the user

member.name: M:OAuth.Net.Components.InMemoryTokenStore.GetTokensByConsumer(System.String)
member.summary: Gets an array of request AND access tokens associated with a given consumer.
member.returns: A collection of request AND access tokens, or null if no tokens are associated with the consumer

member.name: M:OAuth.Net.Components.InMemoryTokenStore.Update(OAuth.Net.Common.IRequestToken)
member.summary: Updates the the given request token in the store.
member.returns: true, iff the token was successfully updated in the store.

member.name: M:OAuth.Net.Components.InMemoryTokenStore.Update(OAuth.Net.Common.IAccessToken)
member.summary: Updates the the given access token in the store.
member.returns: true, iff the token was successfully updated in the store.

member.name: M:OAuth.Net.Components.InMemoryTokenStore.Remove(OAuth.Net.Common.IRequestToken)
member.summary: Removes the specified request token from the store.
member.returns: true, iff the token was successfully removed from the store. This will return false if the token did not exist in the store.

member.name: M:OAuth.Net.Components.InMemoryTokenStore.Remove(OAuth.Net.Common.IAccessToken)
member.summary: Removes the specified access token from the store.
member.returns: true, iff the token was successfully removed from the store. This will return false if the token did not exist in the store.

member.name: M:OAuth.Net.Components.InMemoryTokenStore.GetByPredicate(System.Predicate{OAuth.Net.Common.IRequestToken},System.Predicate{OAuth.Net.Common.IAccessToken})
member.summary: Gets an array of request AND access tokens that match the supplied predicates.
member.returns: An array of request AND access tokens, or null if no tokens match the predicates

member.name: P:OAuth.Net.Components.InMemoryTokenStore.Tokens
member.summary: Gets all the tokens in the store as an array.

member.name: P:OAuth.Net.Components.InMemoryTokenStore.Count
member.summary: The total number of tokens held in the store

member.name: P:OAuth.Net.Components.InMemoryTokenStore.RequestTokens
member.summary: Gets all the request tokens in the store as an array.

member.name: P:OAuth.Net.Components.InMemoryTokenStore.CountRequestTokens
member.summary: The number of request tokens held in the store

member.name: P:OAuth.Net.Components.InMemoryTokenStore.AccessTokens
member.summary: Gets all the access tokens in the store as an array.

member.name: P:OAuth.Net.Components.InMemoryTokenStore.CountAccessTokens
member.summary: The number of access tokens held in the store

member.name: T:OAuth.Net.Components.InMemoryCallbackStore
member.summary: Implements a thread safe in memory callback store.

member.name: M:OAuth.Net.Components.InMemoryCallbackStore.AddCallback(OAuth.Net.Common.IRequestToken,System.Uri)
member.summary: Appends a new callback to the store.
member.returns: true if the callbackUri is succesfully appended or false if there already exists a callbackUri for the token

member.name: M:OAuth.Net.Components.InMemoryCallbackStore.ContainsCallback(OAuth.Net.Common.IRequestToken)
member.summary: Determins if the store contains a callback for the supplied token.

member.name: M:OAuth.Net.Components.InMemoryCallbackStore.RemoveCallback(OAuth.Net.Common.IRequestToken)
member.summary: Removes the callbackUri from the store for the supplied token. This method should be used to obtain the callback Uri when redirecting the user to ensure that it is removed from the store.
member.returns: The callback URI or null if none found.

member.name: T:OAuth.Net.Components.OAuthConsumer
member.summary: A simple consumer which minimally implements IConsumer.

member.name: M:OAuth.Net.Components.OAuthConsumer.#ctor(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Creates a consumer with the given key and secret. The status will be Unknown.

member.name: M:OAuth.Net.Components.OAuthConsumer.#ctor(System.String,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Creates a consumer with the given key and secret. The status will be Unknown.

member.name: M:OAuth.Net.Components.OAuthConsumer.#ctor(System.String,System.String,System.String,OAuth.Net.Common.ConsumerStatus)
member.summary: Creates a consumer with the given key, secret and status.

member.name: P:OAuth.Net.Components.OAuthConsumer.Key
member.summary: The consumer key (this MUST be unique across all consumers)

member.name: P:OAuth.Net.Components.OAuthConsumer.Secret
member.summary: The consumer secret

member.name: P:OAuth.Net.Components.OAuthConsumer.Status
member.summary: The status of the consumer

member.name: P:OAuth.Net.Components.OAuthConsumer.FriendlyName
member.summary: The name of the consumer. Service providers may choose to expose this to users.

member.name: T:OAuth.Net.Components.InMemoryWindowedRequestIdValidator
member.summary:
An IRequestIdValidator which requires that timestamps fall within a time window of the server's time. Requests with timestamps outside this window are rejected. Request within this window must have nonces that are unique to that consumer key in the time window. This cuts down the length of time that nonce have to be cached.
The consumer key should be validated before the nonce and timestamp to avoid potential resource attacks involving large numbers of requests with large numbers of different consumer keys making the cache very large.

member.name: P:OAuth.Net.Components.InMemoryWindowedRequestIdValidator.HalfWindow
member.summary: The number of seconds +/- server time that a timestamp must fall within to be valid

member.name: T:OAuth.Net.Components.MD5HashVerificationProvider
member.summary: Implements the Verification Provider by hashing the token with the consumer key. The return verifier must equal this value.

member.name: M:OAuth.Net.Components.MD5HashVerificationProvider.Generate(OAuth.Net.Common.IRequestToken)
member.summary: Generates a new Verification code for the given token.

member.name: M:OAuth.Net.Components.MD5HashVerificationProvider.IsValid(OAuth.Net.Common.IRequestToken,System.String)
member.summary: Checks to see if the provided verifier is valid for this Request token.
